A big congrats! to assistant professor Em Rabelais, PhD, RN, who, along with their co-organizing colleagues, received the 2020 Global Hero Award from GLMA Nursing: Nurses Advancing LGBTQ Health Equality. @Dr_Whomever @GLMA_Nsg @thisisUIC @UICnews
I so wanted to do the Ethics Training for @thisisUIC this afternoon, but I can barely stay awake.

In the last 36 hours, I have had the privilege to be able to talk about   voting and our community with public policy students at @thisisUIC, law students at @DePaulLaw and doctors at @UChicagoMed.

The future looks bright y'all.
